title: List of Australia national soccer team hat-tricks
text:
Since the <a href="Socceroos">Socceroos</a>' first match in 1922, 29 players have scored a <a href="hat-trick%20%28association%20football%29">hat-trick</a> (three or more goals in a single match). The first player to do so was <a href="George%20Smith%20%28Australian%20footballer%29">George Smith</a> in a win over <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20football%20team">New Zealand</a> in 1933. <a href="Archie%20Thompson">Archie Thompson</a>'s thirteen goals in the <a href="Australia%2031%E2%80%930%20American%20Samoa">31–0</a> victory over <a href="American%20Samoa%20national%20football%20team">American Samoa</a> is the <a href="world%20record">world record</a> for most goals in a match.
Notes.
 The result is presented with Australia's score first.
